pageSize.description: Page size for the paging request, default: 20

page.description: Page number for the paging request, default: 1

from.description: Filter payment requests by start date. Returns only requests created **on or after** this date.

to.description: Filter payment requests by end date. Returns only requests created **on or before** this date.

customer.description: Filter payment requests with one customer attribute (name, email, CPF or CNPJ)

pixKey.description: Filter payment requests by Pix Key
